content: नास्तिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} or --कः [नास्ति परलोकस्तत्साधनमदृष्टं तत्साक्षीश्वरो वा इति मतिरस्य ठन्] An atheist, unbeliever, one who denies the authority of the Vedas and a future life or the existence of a supreme ruler or creator of the universe; <ls>Śi. 16. 7</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 11</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">8. 22.</ls>
